Remember, just do the thing. It's better than not doing it at all, waiting for the perfect moment or having the perfect skills.

Oh interesting! Well hopefully no ruined plans in your future 🤞
Oh man I am the same way and it's just another drop in my "I probably am on the spectrum bucket" along with dozens of other things

Oh man ;-; I feel you, sometimes the obsession becomes a hindrance when you're too exhausted to do anything and it's like "looks like you're wasting another day! Bet that makes you feel even worse"

It's an endless cycle 🥲

And unfortunately a 9-5 demands almost any energy I have. I'm going to try to priortize making illustrations again soon, I want to have more sketches and art to show people. Especially as I ramp up for my art book. Please stay tuned; I know I've been recycling the same pieces for a while 😭

It is an ongoing fight inside of me that I can't focus on my illustration + writing AND make a livable amount of money. When I was freelance, I made less than 10k in one year and that was mostly from taking on a teaching role. I want to be able to focus on and hone my craft. But health insurance
Firebird, 2019

oh, it's been centuries since i've posted here.

time to reactivate?

mushrroooom knight!

Color roughs? Sure maybe this one, but at that point why would you need it? You're like 80% of the way through the prep process. Lines? Nah it can't even understand the separation of hair from necks/shoulders. Finals? Ah okay you just skipped to the end and made an AI image I see. 2/2

I don't get the argument "oh Ai is a powerful tool FOR artists" because what part of the process is it powerful for? For research and mood boarding? It's bad at that because it pulls phony research. Thumbnails? Studies on programs like midjourney show they reduce diversity in image composition. 1/2
Aw thanks, that's so kind!

I did it. I finished the latest draft of my sci fi novel! I think it's pretty darn good too!!

 Now for the fun part of querying it....

‼️Attention Black writers‼️

#FiyahLitMag subs are now open for the Spring UNTHEMED issue with Guest Editor @@279906 until Jan 31st.

🔥 Short fiction: 2-7k words
🔥 novelettes: no more than 15k words words
🔥 poetry: less than 1k words

DON'T SELF-REJECT!

Details: fiyahlitmag.com/submissions/
progress progress progress
eyestrain's too bad. Done for the night
How does anyone do anything after a 9-5? I've made it this far and am s t r u g g l i n g

session 3 today!
I only did a half day so mainly focused on blocking in the shadow side, keeping detail to a minimum and focusing on the big shapes and values.

I used transparent pigments thinned down with gamsol and then gradually adding some light with more opaque but still thinned pigments.

A businessman sees a fisherman relaxing and advises him to use his downtime to expand his business. The fisherman asks why. To gain wealth so he can relax and enjoy life, replies the businessman. The fisherman smiles; he already does. 

More productivity will lead to producing more, not living more.
His name is Elming, he's my main character in Elder Scrolls Online and he loves Bantam Guar!

Hey all, after adopting the handle as a 14 year old (maybe 15 idk) I am gonna shift away from the BeinCraban handle. When I was 14 playing LOTRO obsessively I was quite proud of it. But kinda don't wanna be attached to it anymore. Sucks, cause I just ordered new business cards. Oh well

I am Katherine Souza, an artist, writer, and game designer. Along with illustration/ painting, I have written adult speculative fiction that I am hoping to get published, and currently am a quest designer on Elder Scrolls Online!

finished the novella draft! now to return to the lower city

⭐Bizarre Shark

Is this our Goddess? A curse has befallen her; the shadow of ignorance has corrupted her and now she wanders aimlessly over the deep ruins of the ancient capital. I believe her true self is trapped within this beast...and I will release it.

#Art
In a mad dash to finish this novella draft sometime soon for querying but I am in an even madder dash to somehow muck through Baldur's Gate's lower city

I am going to open to novella submissions in January. I love a good novella. I'll be accepting query letters for completed manuscripts between 20K and 50K words. Genre wise, I'm looking for anything that is literary fiction to all kinds of speculative.
Aw thank you!

I made a cheat sheet for the Art Feeds hashtags because I don't even remember them all yet. 😅 You can get any post into a feed by adding tags in a reply. Good for when you forgot to tag or want to give someone else a boost! #art

Friends! I am open to novel-length sensitivity reads! I read for: Non-binary/queer/lesbian/anxiety/depression/fat! $300 USD for 60k-100k, negotiable based on length. Discounts for marginalised folks! DM me for info, RTs appreciated! <3

The Patchwork Conscience of Oz

A painting I did last year for Wizards, specifically to envision the 'Smoldering Corpse' tavern from Planescape! I got to do a ton of little vignettes for this one, and I had a great time with all the little stories :>

I am Katherine Souza, an artist, writer, and game designer. Along with illustration/ painting, I have written adult speculative fiction that I am hoping to get published, and currently am a quest designer on Elder Scrolls Online!

@@4189372 all socials
www.katherinesouza.art

A star is sharing the story of its impending death. Seen through an aging astro-physicist, 2 ideologically opposed AI, & a nameless alien child, the story spans millennia. The star tries to make sense of it all & ask if it was worth it to live; if it was worth it to die. 

#sff #a #amquerying

I can't imagine the frustration my colleagues in the midst of layoffs are feeling . If you are looking at ZoS for a job (specifically in design) feel free to let me know and I can give some advice.

Game devs are tired. Writers are tired. Comic book creators are tired. Musicians are tired. Actors are tired. Every industry that produces media you love has been ravaged by a parasitic executive class who want to starve creators to feed some shitcunt's desire for a seventh house
